description: Pat is one of those quiet, 'Guy Next Door' types I've learned show up for one reason, to satisfy a hidden exhibitionist streak simmering just below the surface.The sexy twinkle in his eyes was apparent from the beginning but once the biography interview was over & it was time to get naked, Pat had more then just gotten in touch with his inner porn star, it has taken over! As his shorts hit the ground, it looked like there was a flashlight inside his boxers and his batteries were already leaking. From doing a little dance to show off that snow white ass to down on all fours to give a full view of those swollen balls and fat eight plus inches sticking out like a missile, Pat put on a show that redefines just how hot hot can be! He almost had me reaching for the Kleenex before he did but as you'll see, he prefers rubbing his load onto his smooth chest over tissues!
title: Big Boy Bone, Scene #02
